info.title: Aemo
info.description: Access to AEMO Web Services - Including NMI Discovery and standing Data .   See [Tally Documentation](https://tallyit.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PUB/pages/876019721/AEMO+API) for a detailed description of how to use the API and examples.

get.description: This  operation takes a NMI and outputs the standing data in a XML format

parameters.name: nmi
parameters.description: the nmi, inputted with no formatting

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes no inputs and gives all statuses in a JSON format as an output.

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes the NMI and gives the previous energy provider (assuming recent). This is outputted in a JSON format.

parameters.name: nmi
parameters.description: the nmi, inputted with no formatting

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes the NMI and outputs the relevant NMI detailed result in a JSON format

parameters.name: nmi
parameters.description: The nmi code, inputted with no formatting

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes a DPID and its relevant jurisdiction code. It outputs a NMI detailed result in a JSON format

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: the jurisdiction code, normally the state it is within

parameters.name: DPID
parameters.description: The DPID, between 3 and 10 long normally.

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes a Meter Serial and its relevant jurisdiction code. It outputs a NMI detailed result in a JSON format

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: the jurisdiction code, normally same as state

parameters.name: Meter Serial
parameters.description: the meter serial, between 3 and 20 long normally

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description:
This operation takes at least a jurisdiction code, a postcode, a street name, and a house number, various other inputs can be used.
It outputs a NMI detailed result in a JSON format

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: the jurisdiction code, normally same as state

parameters.name: housenumbersuffix
parameters.description: the house number suffix such as A in 2A

parameters.name: lotnumber
parameters.description: the lot number, maybe used instead of house number

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description: This operation takes no inputs and provides details on your MSATS Limits status.

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

get.description:
This operation takes an input of a single line address and outputs a detailed NMI result within JSON format. It can also take input of NMI's, DPID's and Meter Serial's if given the correct input format, these each use the other operations within the api.
This returns a detailed NMI result.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description:
The address input, preferably in the format of:
"Unit X, X street name, suburb, postcode" or close to it.
also capable of using NMI, DPID and Meter serial inputs,
NMI: "12345678901",
DPID: "DPID 123456 (state code)", 
Meter: "meter 123456 (state code)"
 case does not matter

parameters.name: participantUser
parameters.description: The user code for the participant

example.xmlContent:
NEMMCO NEMMCO-MSG-924407792 2020-12-10T21:29:00+10:00 NMID High NEMMCOBATCH NEM
6102206271
293 BELMORE RD BALWYN NORTH VIC 3104 84721891
RESIDENTIAL LOW CITIPP LNSP 6103052254
293 BELMORE RD BALWYN NORTH VIC 3104 84721891
RESIDENTIAL LOW CITIPP LNSP 6103048137
293 BELMORE RD BALWYN NORTH VIC 3104 84721891
BUSINESS LOW CITIPP LNSP 0
